Nightlight::

Nightlight fell near Aerotaur, she wasn't seriously injured "I'm 
fine"said the femme when she heard her name and asked"And you? are 
you ok Aerotaur?"

Windlord arrived to the place after granade explode and looking to 
all  "What had happened here? Where's Grounded?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Grounded, after following after Windlord had dug himself under 
> ground.  He came under the grenade, digging a hole under it, but 
> just finishing as it explodes, leaving the blastn ot as powerful to 
> Aerotaurs back, but extremely condensed through Grounded's 
> tunnel schorching the bot and leaving him laying in the bottom of 
> the hole.
